To all the ignorant, complaining bigots, we'll see just how much of an impact your decision of refusing to watch future episodes of Torchwood will have on the series. Trust me, your intolerance will have no effect at all. The show will proceed to go on. 

So...y'know, shove that middle up your @ss =D

I was afraid this would happen when Starz took on Torchwood. Leave it to us Americans to inject sex into everything, especially if it generates controversy. Bad enough that the show was already borderline soap opera. When will they learn the difference between character development and unnecessary drama and gratuitous sex scenes.

To all of you dumbasses who are hating on the show:

FUCK YOU, you ignorant homophobes! Torchwood was first aired on BBC, in other words, its British. When it was brought to American Television, Starz knew what they were getting into. So fuckin' what if a major character in the show Bisexual. If you really cared for Science Fiction you would over-look you hatred for something you obviously don't understand. And yes, the suffix -phobia means fear, you're all obviously afraid of seeing gay sex which means... Yes I'm afraid you are in fact, homophobes.
For example, Captain Jack is a bisexual who has a daughter and had a grandson. Gwen Cooper fucked a female alien in the British series. All the main characters got some, which makes sense. In a high stress job like that you gotta find a better way to relieve it right?
And one last thing, the show will go on. If there are people out there who love the show like I do, there is no doubt in my mind that show will continue.

P.S. The actress who plays as Gwen Cooper was in the British version of Playboy ;) THAT my friends is how famous the show was in Britain.

I can't say I'm a big fan of the new series, a totally different show than Children of Earth. But thehell, it's good entertainment...
